message: I think it's fair to keep most of the money, but I want to be generous. This is a good starting point.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be more realistic. I propose a 60/40 split.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a decent share. This offer is closer to what I need.
Time is running out, and the value of the money is decreasing. I'm offering a reasonable 52/48 split. Let's close this deal.
